form.label: SH - 01 - Dashboards Deep Analysis - Dashboard - v3.0.7
form.description: Splunk Dashboards, Reports/Alerts & Lookups Analysis Dashboard

search.query: | from lookup:splunk_rest_data_ui_views_sh_kv_store_lookup | fields _time,shcluster_label,Splunk_Instance,Splunk_Roles,app,sharing,title,label,description,type,dashboard_size,author,location,updated,time_range,Report_Reference,Dashboard_Reference,Lookup_Reference,Datamodel_Reference,Macro_Reference,Index_Reference,Sourcetype_Reference,Source_Reference,Eventtype_Reference,Rest_Reference,search,BaseSearch,acl_perms_read,acl_perms_write,panel_title,num_panels,auto_refresh_delay,submitButton,autoRun | search NOT app IN ($app21$) NOT title IN ($title21$) | eval url="http://" . shcluster_label . ":8000/en-US/app/" . app . "/" . title | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_identity_info(author)` | `fillnull_identity_info` | `get_macro_definition(shcluster_label,Macro_Reference)` | `strftime_format(updated)` | eval Num_Searches=mvcount(search) | eval Effective_autoRun = if(autoRun="false" AND submitButton="true" AND is_time_selector="true", "false", "true" ) | fillnull value=0 num_panels Num_Searches | fillnull value="false" autoRun | fillnull value="none" submitButton acl_perms_read acl_perms_write auto_refresh_delay panel_title | fillnull value="no-dashboard-reference" Dashboard_Reference | fillnull value="no-report-reference" Report_Reference | fillnull value="Undefined" | search shcluster_label="$shcluster_label1$" Splunk_Roles="$Splunk_Roles1$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance1$" app="$app1$" author=$author1$ sharing=$sharing1$ title="$title$" label="$label$" Report_Reference="$Report_Reference1$" Dashboard_Reference="$Dashboard_Reference1$" Lookup_Reference="$Lookup_Reference1$" Datamodel_Reference="$Datamodel_Reference1$" Macro_Reference="$Macro_Reference1$" Index_Reference="$Index_Reference1$" Sourcetype_Reference="$Sourcetype_Reference1$" Source_Reference="$Source_Reference1$" Eventtype_Reference="$Eventtype_Reference1$" Rest_Reference="$Rest_Reference1$" BaseSearch="$BaseSearch$" dashboard_size <= $dashboard_size$ search="*$search$*" emp_name="$emp_name$" emp_title="$emp_title$" emp_type="$emp_type$" emp_status="$emp_status$" emp_dep="$emp_dep$" emp_lob1="$emp_lob1$" emp_cc="$emp_cc$" emp_city="$emp_city$" emp_region1="$emp_region1$" emp_country="$emp_country$" time_range="$time_range$" auto_refresh_delay="$auto_refresh_delay$" submitButton="$submitButton$" acl_perms_read="$acl_perms_read$" acl_perms_write="$acl_perms_write$" panel_title="*$panel_title$*" autoRun="$autoRun$" num_panels >= $num_panels$ Num_Searches >= $Num_Searches$

index=`setup_summary_index` source=splunk_internal_web_access_idx_summary_tracker | fields _time shcluster_label Splunk_Instance app Dashboard_Name user Latest_Access min_spent max_spent avg_spent | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_shcluster_label(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_dashboards_info(shcluster_label,app,Dashboard_Name)` | search shcluster_label="$shcluster_label1$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance1$" Splunk_Roles="$Splunk_Roles1$" app="$app1$" Dashboard_Name="$title$"

html.h1: SH - 01 - Dashboards Deep Analysis - Dashboard - v1 (Updated: Jan 31, 2021)

li.a: 1. Dashboards Metadata info from KV Store

search.query: | stats count by Sourcetype_Reference | search NOT Sourcetype_Reference IN ("*$*")
| where title="$selected_title$" | dedup title | eval URI="http://" . shcluster_label . ":8000/en-US/app/" . app . "/" . title | fields URI | dedup URI

html.h1: Click on any Dashboard Title Name to open all Drill Down Panels then click in the "1. Dashboard URI" input above to prepare the URI: $URI$

search.query: | `get_latest_access_human(Days_Latest_Access)` | eval Num_Searches=mvcount(search) | table title label shcluster_label app sharing acl_perms_read acl_perms_write author updated emp_name num_panels Num_Searches Effective_autoRun auto_refresh_delay submitButton autoRun Days_Latest_Access_Display Latest_Access dashboard_size Dashboard_Reference | sort 0 num_panels | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_reference_fields` | `rename_dashboards_fields`

html.h1: Click on any entry to close all Drill Down Panels

search.query: | where title="$selected_title$" | stats count by search | table count search
| where title="$selected_title$" | stats count by description | fields description
| where title="$selected_title$" | stats count by panel_title | fields panel_title | sort 0 panel_title
| where title="$selected_title$" | stats count by time_range | fields time_range
| where title="$selected_title$" | stats count by BaseSearch | fields BaseSearch
| where title="$selected_title$" | stats count by Index_Reference | table Index_Reference
| where title="$selected_title$" | stats count by Sourcetype_Reference | fields Sourcetype_Reference
| where title="$selected_title$" | stats count by Source_Reference | fields Source_Reference
| where title="$selected_title$" | stats count by Eventtype_Reference | fields Eventtype_Reference
| where title="$selected_title$" | stats count by Report_Reference | fields Report_Reference
| where title="$selected_title$" | stats count by Lookup_Reference | fields Lookup_Reference
| where title="$selected_title$" | stats count by Macro_Reference | fields Macro_Reference
| where title="$selected_title$" | stats count by Rest_Reference | fields Rest_Reference

panel.title: 5.11 Dashboard Changes in the last 7 Days for: $selected_title$

search.query: index=`setup_summary_index` source="splunk_internal_splunkd_ui_access_ko_changes_idx_summary_tracker" Knowledge_Object_Type=Dashboards Knowledge_Object="$selected_title$" earliest=-7d@d | fields _time Change_Time shcluster_label user Client_IP Knowledge_Object_Type Knowledge_Object Change_Status Duration Provenance | stats count latest(*) as * by shcluster_label Knowledge_Object | `ustime_format(updated)` | `ustime_format(Change_Time)`

panel.title: 2. Top N Most Used Dashboards Over Time

chart.title: | timechart limit=0 dc(user) by label useother=false" / Most Used Dashboards In Time Period : "| stats latest(_time) AS latest_access_time dc(user) as "# of Users" values(user) as user values(label) as label count by view app

search.query: | timechart useother=f fixedrange=f usenull=f limit=0 $span_period$ dc(user) As Num_Users by $split_by_tok_11$ where max in top$top_tok2$

li.a: Splunk Dashboards Summary Index Gen Job From REST
Splunk Dashboards KV Store Gen Job From Summary Index

html.h2: Post-process searches or Base Searches: It is highly recommended to use this feature. Follow the example here:

html.h3: Adding Submit will add autorun to the dashboard and keeps it unchecked
Dashboard, no Submit and no Time Selector --> runs
Dashboard, no Submit with Time Selector and autorun is checked --> Run
Dashboard, no Submit with Time Selector and autorun is unchecked --> Run
Dashboard with Submit Button and no Time Selector and autorun is checked --> Run
Dashboard with Submit Button and no Time Selector and autorun is unchecked --> Run
Dashboard with Submit Button, with Time Selector and autorun is checked --> Run
Dashboard with Submit Button, with Time Selector and autorun is unchecked --> does not run
Dashboard No Submit Button, with Time Selector, Dropdown with no default and autorun is checked or unchecked --> does not run

search.query: | stats Latest(_time) As _time | fields _time | `strftime_format(_time)` | rename _time As "splunk_rest_data_ui_views_sh_kv_store Latest Refresh"
